description:
Help satisfy your hunger with Quaker Instant Oatmeal Weight Control, made with whole grain Quaker oats. This variety pack gives you three tasty flavors to choose from: Banana Bread, Maple & Brown Sugar, and Cinnamon. These single-serving packs contain whole grains, protein and fiber** to help support your weight-management plan, and they're easy to prepare and enjoy everywhere. Even on your busiest days, you can help fuel your family with a wholesome breakfast that's ready in just 90 seconds. Each box includes eight single-serving packets.

Quaker® Flavor Variety Weight Control Instant Oatmeal Natural & Artificial Flavors

-Whole-grain Quaker oats may help support weight-management plans
- 7 grams of protein and 6 grams of fiber** per serving to help fill you up
- Includes three popular flavors
- Single-serving packets are ready in just 90 seconds
- Heart-healthy*

*Diets rich in whole grain foods and other plant foods and low in saturated fat and cholesterol may help reduce the risk of heart disease.

**This product contains 3 grams total fat per packet.

Weight Control Oatmeal Doesn't Sacrifice Flavor

Weight Control Instant Oatmeal has the same rich flavors of Quaker's original instant oatmeal and is made with whole grains and 7 grams of protein and 6 grams of fiber** to help fill you up.

**This product contains 3 grams total fat per packet.

Preparation is simple: empty a packet of Quaker Instant Oatmeal Weight Control into a bowl, add half a cup of boiling water, and stir. You'll have a wholesome bowl of oatmeal in just 90 seconds for energy to help get you through your morning. And with convenient single-serving packs, you can enjoy Quaker Instant Oatmeal Weight Control at home, at the office, or on the go.


100 Percent Whole Grain Quaker Oats to Help Support Your Weight Management Plan

Quaker oats are made from 100 percent whole grain oats, which means all the parts of the grain are intact, including the fiber.
title: Quaker® Weight Control Instant Oatmeal Variety Pack- 8pk

description:
Make it with milk for a boost of protein. Mustache included! Blippar enabled. Additional 8 g of protein with 1 cup of skim milk. See back panel for more information. 100% natural whole grain. Heart Healthy: Diets rich in whole grain foods and other plant foods and low in saturated fat and cholesterol may help reduce the risk of heart disease. Get a perfect start to your day. Dive into a bowlful of hot, delicious Quaker Oatmeal. Throw in a few fresh berries, some toasted nuts, maple syrup or cinnamon. Just like the day itself, the possibilities are limitless. Especially when you're powered by 100% natural Quaker Oats. With energy to help get you going, fiber to help fill you up, and whole grains that can support heart health, Quaker Oatmeal is a perfect start. For over 135 years, Quaker has unlocked the power of oats to help people get the perfect start to each day. Download Blippar app. 1. Blippar. 2. Scan the Quaker man. 3. Take a milk mustache selfie & get recipes Diets rich in whole grain foods and other plant foods, and low in saturated fat and cholesterol, may reduce the risk of heart disease. American Heart Association certified. Meets criteria for heart-healthy food. The majority of this canister is made from recycled paperboard. Please have package available when calling.

Directions
Preparing Great Oatmeal: 1 Serving: 1/2 cup oats; 1 cup water or milk; dash salt (optional) (For low sodium diets, omit salt.) 2 Servings: 1 cup oats; 1-3/4 cups water or milk; 1/8 tsp. salt (optional) (For low sodium diets, omit salt.) Stove Top: 1. Boil water or milk and salt. 2. Stir in oats. 3. Cook about 5 minutes over medium heat; stir occasionally. Microwave (1 Serving): 1. Combine water or milk, salt and oats in medium microwave-safe bowl. 2. Microwave on high 2-1/2 to 3 minutes; stir before serving. Quick and easy!
title: Quaker® Old Fashioned Rolled Oats - 18oz

description: Microwave Directions (Recommended): 1. Remove lid completely. 2. Add cold water to microwave fill line (1/2 cup) and stir. 3. Microwave on high for 45-60 seconds. 4. Stir well and let cool to taste. Grains will continue to soften. Enjoy! Note: Microwave vary in power, so cook time may need adjustment. Hot Water Directions: 1. Peel back lid half way. 2. Add boiling water to hot water fill line (1/3 cup). 3. Stir well and cover with lid. Let stand covered for 5 minutes. Enjoy! Note: Adjust water for desired thickness. For softer grains, cover and let stand for additional minutes. Consumer within two hours of preparation. Additional space included in cup to prevent product from boiling over.

description: Rise and shine - brightly - with a warm, wholesome and delicious bowl of Farmer's Market Berry Crumble oatmeal. It's a protein-fueled, high fiber way to start your day with plenty of positive energy. Each bowl is a hearty blend of whole grains, like whole rolled oats, steel cut oats and the super-grain quinoa. The thick, rich texture is full of body and perfectly balanced with a mouthwatering assortment of sweet strawberries, blueberries and raspberries. Made with just the good stuff and Non-GMO Project verified. So you can feel great about every single bite. In my house, breakfast is the most important meal of the day. This delicious recipe is a balance of energy, nutrition and flavors that you can dream about waking up to. To your vitality, - Lizanne, founder of thinkThin. Try thinkThin High Protein Bars. Verified Non-GMO by the Non-GMO Project. Product of USA. Microwave Directions (Recommended): 1. Empty contents into a large microwave safe bowl. 2. Stir in 1/2 cup of cold water. Or use empty packet as a measuring cup. 3. Microwave on high for 75-90 seconds. 4. Stir well and let cool to taste. Grains will continue to soften. Enjoy! Caution: Bowl and contents may be hot! Do not put hot water into empty packet. Microwaves vary in power, so cook time may need adjustment. Hot Water Directions: 1. Empty packet into bowl. 2. Add 1/3 cup boiling water to bowl. 3. Stir well. Cover. Let stand covered for 5 minutes. Enjoy! Note: Adjust water desired thickness. For softer grains, cover and let stand for additional minutes. Consume within two hours of preparation. Store in a cool dry place.

description:
Add more fiber to your diet with Quaker® Instant Oatmeal High Fiber, made with whole grain Quaker oats and the sweet flavor of Cinnamon Swirl. These single-serving packs contain the same rich flavor and fast preparation as regular Quaker Instant Oatmeal. Even on your busiest days, you can help fuel your family with a nutritious, high-fiber breakfast option that's ready in just 90 seconds.

Quaker® High Fiber Cinnamon Swirl Instant Oatmeal Naturally & Artificially Flavored

- Whole grain Quaker oats with 40 percent of your daily fiber needs based on a 2,000-calorie diet
- Cinnamon Swirl flavor
- Single-serving packets are ready in just 90 seconds
- Heart-healthy* oatmeal

*Diets rich in whole grain foods and other plant foods and low in saturated fat and cholesterol may help reduce the risk of heart disease.

High Fiber Cinnamon-Swirl Oatmeal in 90 Seconds

Based on a 2,000-calorie diet, meet 40 percent of your daily fiber needs with just one serving of High Fiber Instant Oatmeal. This wholesome option offers Quaker's classic Cinnamon Swirl flavor.

Preparation is simple: empty a packet of Quaker High Instant Oatmeal into a bowl, add half a cup of boiling water, and stir. You'll have a wholesome bowl of oatmeal in just 90 seconds for energy you want to help start your morning. And with convenient single-serving packs, you can enjoy Quaker Instant Oatmeal at home, at the office, or on the go.

Whole Grain Quaker Oats with 40 Percent of Your Daily Fiber Needs Based on a 2,000-Calorie Diet

Quaker oats are made from 100 percent whole grain oats, which means all the parts of the grain are intact, including the fiber.

description:
100% whole grain. Oatmeal may help reduce the risk of heart disease. See side for details. Cooks in one minute. Mom's best cereals. Say yes to the best! No artificial flavors or preservatives. No high fructose corn syrup. No hydrogenated oil. Perfect for baking, too! 100% Whole Grain: 40 grams per serving. Eat 48 g or more of whole grains daily. Family friendly for four generations. Made with renewable wind energy (We purchase wind energy credits to offset 100% of the electricity used to make the cereal in this canister). Of Course You Care, and So Do We: Mom's Best cereals supports the use of renewable wind energy, and our diligent recycling and water reduction efforts help to conserve natural resources. Our commitment to you goes beyond the goodness of our products. We strive to make choices that benefit families, enhance our communities and sustain the environment. We all know that little things can make a big difference and this idea has mattered to us since 1919. Our whole grain oatmeals are a delicious, affordable and environmentally friendly way to do what's best for the people around your breakfast table and around the planet. More than 95% of waste materials are recycled at our Minnesota plant (Calculated for the following waste materials generated in 2011: packaging, dry ingredients, partially processed cereal, cereal dust, and ordinary trash). Since 2006, we've purchased more than 22 million kilowatt hours of renewable wind energy, a benefit equal to taking nearly 3,200 cars off the road! Quality Guarantee: Your purchase refunded or replaced if you are not satisfied. Best if used by date and proof of purchase required. Or, send package information, reason for dissatisfaction and amount paid to: Mom's Best Cereals, Consumer Response, PO Box 1025, Lakeville, MN 55044. Heart Healthy: 3 g of soluble fiber daily from oatmeal, in a diet low in saturated fat and cholesterol, may help reduce the risk of heart disease. Mom's Best Cereals Quick Oats contains 2 g per serving. Made in USA.

Directions
Cooking Directions: Stove Top: 1. Boil water and salt. 2. Stir in oats. 3. Cook about 1 minute over medium heat; stir occasionally. Microwave (One Serving): 1. Combine water, salt and oats in a medium microwaveable bowl. 2. Microwave 1-1/2 to 2 minutes; stir before serving. Caution bowl may be hot. 1 Serving: 1/2 cup oats; 1 cup water; dash salt (optional). 2 Servings: 1 cup oats; 1-3/4 cups water; 1/8 tsp salt (optional). 3 Servings: 1-1/2 cups oats; 2-1/2 cups water; 1/8 tsp salt (optional). 6 Servings: 3 cups oats, 5 cups water, 1/4 tsp salt (optional).
title: Mom's Best® Rolled Oatmeal - 16oz

bullets: 100% whole grain.
No artificial flavors or preservatives.
No high fructose corn syrup.
No hydrogenated oil.
Made with renewable wind energy
soft_bullets.title: highlights

description: Strawberry shortcake, maple multi-grain muffin and apple pie flavored. Gluten free happiness! Certified gluten free oats, chia, flax, amaranth & quinoa. Certified gluten-free. High fiber. Good source of protein. Dairy & casein free. Non GMO Project verified. nongmoproject.org. We Make People Happy: It all started in the small bakery of a natural foods market on Main Street in Glastonbury, Connecticut. I listened to my celiac customers' concerns about the taste of many of the gluten free options available to them, and thought that no one should have to suffer because of a food allergy or other special dietary need. And so my mission became to create all products that would make my customers happy. Today, that mission has expanded to not only make our customers happy with great-tasting gluten free products, but spreading a little bit of happiness to everyone we meet and work with. I'd also like to encourage you to think about the things that make you happy, and to do something to make yourself, a family member, a friend or even a complete stranger happy. Now our bakery is bigger, but we still bake in small batches. We hope you love our products as much as we love creating them for you. Thank you! - Michael Smulders, Founder. This box is made from 100% recycled fibers and is 100% recyclable. Would you expect anything less from the makers of 100% delicious oatmeal? Made in USA.
title: Bakery on Main Gluten Free Instant Oatmeal with Ancient Grains - 6ct

bullets: Dairy
Casien Free
Gluten Free
Non GMO
Great Source of Protein

description:
All natural, healthy option. Gluten free. Cooks in 1 minute. Good source of fiber. Good source of protein. Excellent source of iron. 220 calories/serving; 2.5 g total fat; 4 g total fiber; 5 g protein. Did you know? We only buy certified gluten free oats. We test for gluten at 10 ppm. We do not blend our oats with barley or rye. Did you know? 100 grams of whole rolled oats, steel cut oats and old fashioned oats have the same nutritional values. Grains offer the most fiber. The USDA defines a good source of fiber as having 4 grams of fiber per serving. One cup of Kathleen's Oats or Muesli has a minimum of 4 grams of fiber per serving. Did you know? Many studies report that Adults need to ingest 20-35 grams of fiber daily. One cup of Kathleen's Oats or Muesli takes cares of 16% of this daily need. Definition of Muesli: mues-li; noun: A cereal of Swiss origin consisting of rolled oats, nuts, seeds and fruit. A tradition of good food. A Tradition of Good Food: As a working mom and a foodie, I created Kathleen's so my two daughters would have tasty, natural, healthy, affordable, and convenient food options. My entire line of Quick Oats contains simple, real ingredients, natural sugar, and provides a convenient breakfast meal option for those individuals that find themselves constantly on the move. A little taste of brown sugar always adds that little umph of sweetness that helps kick-start your day.

Directions
Cooking: Hot Water Directions: 1. Remove lid half way. 2. Add boiling water to fill line (2/3 cup). 3. Stir well and let steep/stand for 2 minutes. 4. Stir and enjoy. (For creamier oatmeal add hot milk or cream). Microwave: 1. Remove lid half way. 2. Add water to fill line (2/3 cup). 3. Microwave 45 seconds to 1 minute. 4. Let cool for up to 1 minute. 5. Stir well and enjoy. Caution: Cup and contents in cup may be hot.
title: Kathleen's® All Natural Gluten Free Brown Sugar Quick Oats 2 oz

Gluten Free

description: Microwave Directions (Recommended): 1. Remove lid completely. 2. Add cold water to microwave fill line (1/2 cup) and stir. 3. Microwave on high for 45-60 seconds. 4. Stir well and let cool to taste. Grains will continue to soften. Enjoy! Note: Microwaves vary in power, so cook time may need adjustment. Hot Water Directions: 1. Peel back lid half way. 2. Add boiling water to hot water fill line (1/3 cup). 3. Stir well and cover with lid. Let stand covered for 5 minutes. Enjoy! Note: Adjust water for desired thickness. For softer grains, cover and let stand for additional minutes. Consume within two hours of preparation. Additional space included in cup to prevent product from boiling over.

Augason Farm's products are an excellent choice for food storage, emergencies, survival, camping and everyday use! Family owned and operated since 1972, Augason Farms believes that great taste is a tradition worth preserving. Crafted with a focus on taste and nutrition, their products are manufactured to the highest standards. Whether enjoying Augason Farm’s products for everyday meals, as an emergency food supply, or years down the road, you can be confident that Augason Farm’s long-term food storage products are guaranteed for quality and taste every time. Make the wise decision and let Augason Farms’ food essentials give you a peace of mind that's as indispensable as it is delicious. *Product good for up to 30 years when unopened. Best when stored in a cool, dry and dark place at temperatures between 55°F and 70°F. Actual shelf life may vary based on individual storage conditions.
